Name: Entrance to the Kanamia Tribe Postcard
Name$english: Entrance to the Kanamia Tribe Postcard
Description: Secluded and self-reliant, the Kanamia Tribe survives through hunting and gathering, shunning contact with outsiders. Around their territory, guarded checkpoints stand as quiet sentinels...
Description$english: Secluded and self-reliant, the Kanamia Tribe survives through hunting and gathering, shunning contact with outsiders. Around their territory, guarded checkpoints stand as quiet sentinels...
Description2$english: Obtaining this item will unlock the corresponding postcard, which can be viewed in the "Archive."
